data.chText: 使适应，使适合（新用途、新情况）
data.enText: to change sth in order to make it suitable for a new use or situation

data.chText: 这些工具多数已经过特别改装，供残疾人使用。
data.enText: Most of these tools have been specially adapted for use by disabled people.

data.chText: 这些式样可以修改，以适应个人不同爱好。
data.enText: These styles can be adapted to suit individual tastes.
to change your behaviour in order to deal more successfully with a new situation

data.chText: 我们不得不迅速适应新制度。
data.enText: We have had to adapt quickly to the new system.
A large organization can be slow to adapt to change.

data.chText: 生物被迫适应，以求生存。
data.enText: The organisms were forced to adapt in order to survive.

data.chText: 你这么快就适应了，真是令人惊奇。
data.enText: It's amazing how soon you adapt.

data.chText: 他过了好一阵子才适应了新环境。
data.enText: It took him a while to adapt himself to his new surroundings.
to change a book or play so that it can be made into a play, film/movie, television programme, etc.

data.chText: 她的长篇小说中有三部已改编成电视节目。
data.enText: Three of her novels have been adapted for television.

simple_means.memory_skill: ad 加强 + apt 适应；能力 → 使适应，适应（环境）

ex.chText: 过一会儿你的眼睛就能适应黑暗。
ex.enText: Your eyes will accommodate to the darkness after a while.

ex.chText: 她不得不使自己适应新的工作。
ex.enText: She had to accommodate to a new job.
He adapted to the new school.

ex.chText: 鲍勃改装了旧汽车，这样他的儿子便能使用。
ex.enText: Bob adapted his old car so his son could use it.

synonyms.bx: 强调改变现有条件以适应新的情况。

ex.chText: 他的眼睛还没有适应黑暗。
ex.enText: His eyes have't adjusted to the darkness yet.
Kids are quite good at adjusting.

synonyms.bx: 指稍微调整以适应特定工作或新的情况，调整幅度没有 adapt 大，常后接介词 to。

tr: adapt or conform oneself to new or different conditions
example: We must adjust to the bad economic situation

tr: make fit for, or change to suit a new purpose
example: Adapt our native cuisine to the available food resources of the new country

value.def: If you adapt to a new situation or adapt yourself to it, you change your ideas or behaviour in order to deal with it successfully.

example.ex: The world will be different, and we will have to be prepared to adapt to the change...
example.tran: 世界会变得不同，我们必须做好准备以适应其变化。

example.ex: They have had to adapt themselves to a war economy.
example.tran: 他们不得不适应战时经济。

value.def: If you adapt something, you change it to make it suitable for a new purpose or situation.

example.ex: Shelves were built to adapt the library for use as an office.
example.tran: 为将图书馆改作办公室而做了一些架子。

value.tran: 使适合，使适应（新用途或新情况）

value.def: If you adapt a book or play, you change it so that it can be made into a film or a television programme.

example.ex: The scriptwriter helped him to adapt his novel for the screen...
example.tran: 编剧帮助他将其所著小说改编成电影。

example.ex: The film has been adapted from a play of the same title.
example.tran: 电影改编自一部同名戏剧。

rootsaffixes.indicate: = to fit, ability 适应；能力
rootsaffixes.title: apt, ept

partsOfSpeech.dec: ad 加强 + apt 适应；能力 → 使适应，适应（环境）
ad 做… + apt 适应；能力 + able 有…能力的 → 有适应能力的
ad 做… + ept 适应；能力 → 有能力的 → 熟练的
apt 适应；能力 + itude 状态 → 适宜；才能
in 无 + apt 适应；能力 → 不适当的；不恰当的
in 无 + ept 适应；能力 → 不适宜的；无能的
in 无 + ept 适应；能力 + itude 表情况 → 无能
ad 做…或加强 + apt 适应 → 适应
ad 做…或加强 + dict〔= dic说〕→ 一再说起 → 上瘾
ad 做…或加强 + duc 引导 + e → 一再引导 → 引证，举例
ad 做…或加强 + ept 能力 → 很有能力 → 熟练的
ad 做…或加强 + her 粘 + e → 坚持；粘附
ad 做…或加强 + jac 躺 + ent 具有…性质的 → 躺在一起 → 邻近的
ad 做…或加强 + just 正确 → 使正确 → 调整
ad 做…或加强 + ministr 管理 + ate 做 → 管理；执行
ad 做…或加强 + mir 惊 + e → 很惊喜 → 羡慕
ad 做…或加强 + mon 警告 + ish 使… → 一再警告 → 告诫
ad 做…或加强 + opt 选择 → 做选择 → 采纳
ad 做…或加强 + umbr 影子 + ate 造成 → 出现影子 → 预示
ad 做…或加强 + vent 来 → 来临
ad 做…或加强 + venture 冒险 → 冒险
